title: WB Toggle Web Component
description: Schema for wb-toggle custom element attributes

label.description: Label text displayed next to the toggle switch

checked.description: Whether the toggle is initially checked/on

label-position.description: Position of the label relative to the toggle

variant.description: Visual style variant of the toggle

loading.description: Whether the toggle shows a loading state

value.description: Value submitted when toggle is checked

onchange.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle state changes

onclick.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle is clicked

onfocus.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle gains focus

onblur.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle loses focus

onwb-toggle:change.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-toggle:change event

aria-labelledby.description: ID of element that labels this toggle

aria-describedby.description: ID of element that describes this toggle
